financial_options.name: Federal Subsidized Student Loan
financial_options.description: Government pays interest during school and deferment periods, providing low-cost financing for educational expenses.

financial_options.name: Federal Unsubsidized Student Loan
financial_options.description: Interest accrues from the disbursement date, offering flexibility for students who don't qualify for subsidized loans.

financial_options.name: Work-Study Programs
financial_options.description: Part-time job opportunities to cover educational expenses, gaining valuable work experience in parallel.

financial_options.name: Scholarships and Grants
financial_options.description: Financial aid that doesn't require repayment, reducing the overall cost of education.

financial_options.name: Part-Time Employment
financial_options.description: Income from part-time work to cover living expenses, promoting financial independence.
